plot: A grounded, well respected newsman in his forties, going through a divorce, becomes roommates with a young, impulsive, struggling actor so they can help each other navigate the pitfalls of life in Los Angeles.
title: The Buddy System
plot_es: A grounded, well respected newsman in his forties, going through a divorce, becomes roommates with a young, impulsive, struggling actor so they can help each other navigate the pitfalls of life in Los Angeles.
plot_en: A grounded, well respected newsman in his forties, going through a divorce, becomes roommates with a young, impulsive, struggling actor so they can help each other navigate the pitfalls of life in Los Angeles.
